abstract: Dolan family, only two weeks after selling Newsday Media Group to Altice, buys back 75 percent of company that includes Long Island newspaper and other assets; Altice will remain partner with 25 percent stake.

headline.print_headline: Ink Hardly Dry on a Newsday Sale, Dolans Buy It Back

snippet: Only two weeks after handing the paper to Altice in a deal for Cablevision, Newsday is again part of the Dolan family holdings....
lead_paragraph: Only two weeks after handing the paper to Altice in a deal for Cablevision, Newsday is again part of the Dolan family holdings.
